title: An Analysis of benefits of corporate social responsibility in Ni Hao Stadsparkpaviljoen, Groningen, The Netherlands
abstract: Nowadays Corporate Social Responsibility issues have been taken into account by more and more companies. Companies start to realize that it is important to be not only profit oriented by paying attention to environmental matters. This thesis is written in order to discover the benefits that are gained by Ni Hao Stadsparkpaviljoen restaurant in Groningen by implementing CSR actions. The author conducted qualitative research and desk research to prove that CSR actions give positive impact to Ni Hao Stadsparkpaviljoen both directly and indirectly. Moreover, the method that was conducted by the author was aimed to prove the literature review. The result of the research was not surprising as it was related to the literature review found by the author. The positive impacts that are gained by Ni Hao Stadsparkpaviljoen are similar to those who applied CSR in their companies. The result was primarily collected through interviews with the employees in Ni Hao Stadsparkpaviljoen restaurant.
contributors: PIETER OOSTERHOF (Advisor 1); XU WU (Advisor 2); A. HOEKSTRA (Examination Committee 1)
